data.name: Age of Dynasty
data.detailed_description:
Age of Dynasty is an open-world survival game that spans from the end of the Stone Age to the future. Every playthrough is
different because of randomly generated worlds and the possibility to play together with your friends.
As a young woman/man you have to fight your way through the last days of the ice age and end the age of hunter-gatherers.
You'll have to build a city and manage its inhabitants to reach new eras and always unlock new buildings and items.
https://discord.gg/tcKGMhHCeQThis is the link to the official discord server, where you can get more information and updates in the future.
The release date is scheduled for later this year.

data.short_description: Age of Dynasty is an open-world survival game that spans from the end of the Stone Age to the future

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or similar
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
